generated.css: body,html{height:100%;overflow-x:hidden}body,h1,h2,h3 a,html,ul3 li{width:100%;margin:0;padding:0;font-family:Arial}.banner{position:relative;text-align:center}.banner img{width:100%;height:400px}header{max-width:100%;position:fixed;text-align:center;background-color:#0c1ca8;padding:10px;width:100%;z-index:1;top:0;left:0}header h1{max-width:70%;color:#fff;border:2px solid #5968ec;padding:6px 12px;display:inline-block;border-radius:10px;margin:0 auto}.banner .welcome{position:absolute;top:25%;left:0;background-color:#0c1ca8;color:#fff;padding:5px;max-width:400px}.welcome h2{font-size:24px}.welcome h2 span{font-size:1.2em}nav{background-color:#f4f4f4;padding:15px 20%;position:sticky;top:70px;z-index:5}nav,nav ul{max-width:100%}nav ul{white-space:nowrap;margin:0 auto}nav li{min-width:48px;min-height:48px;display:inline-block}nav li a{width:100%;text-decoration:none;font-size:16px;background-color:#0c1ca8;padding:10px;border-radius:5px;color:#fff}nav li a.join{color:#f0db1c}@media screen and (max-width:1400px){.banner .welcome h2{font-size:15px}.banner .welcome{top:35%}li{font-size:10px}}@media screen and (max-width:550px){header h1{font-size:1em}.mainContent p{line-height:150%}.banner .welcome br{display:none}.banner img{height:200px}nav{top:110px;padding:15px 0 0;position:static;z-index:5}nav ul{white-space:nowrap;max-width:100%;margin:0}nav li{min-width:48px;min-height:48px;display:block}nav li a{width:100%;text-decoration:none;font-size:16px;background-color:#0c1ca8;padding:10px;border-radius:5px;color:#fff}.images li{display:block;width:100%;margin:25px auto}.mainContent{width:90%;margin:5px;padding:0 20px}}main{max-width:100%;width:1200px;margin:80px auto;padding:0 40px;box-sizing:border-box}article h2{color:#f63232;font-size:32px}article p{line-height:2em;color:#161616}.images{text-align:center;margin:80px 0}iframe:focus{outline:none}#external_link{text-decoration:none;padding:10px;border-radius:5px}xmp{border:3px solid #0c1ca8;padding-left:30px}section.join{background-color:#f4f4f4;text-align:center;padding:60px 20px;color:#4b4b4b}.join h2{font-size:36px}form input{margin:20px 0;padding:10px 20px;font-size:24px;border-radius:28px;border:4px solid #fff}footer{background-color:#0c1ca8;color:#fff;padding:10px;text-align:center}nav li a:hover{text-decoration:underline}.images li img:hover{position:relative;top:-10px;left:-10px}.join form input:focus{border:4px dashed #4b4b4b;outline:none}form input:valid{border:4px solid #71d300}form input:invalid{border:4px solid #f63232}article p:first-line{font-size:1.2em;font-weight:700}section.join p:first-letter{font-family:Georgia,Times New Roman,Times,serif}p::selection{background-color:#f63232;color:#fff}*{user-select:none}.container{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;height:100vh}#board{width:600px;height:600px;margin:0 auto;background-color:#231f20;color:#62c559;border:6px solid #62c559;border-radius:10px;display:grid;grid-template:repeat(3,1fr)/repeat(3,1fr)}.box{border:6px solid #62c559;font-family:Helvetica;font-weight:700;font-size:4em;justify-content:center;align-items:center;cursor:pointer}.box,.row{display:flex}.row{justify-content:space-between}.button{background-color:#62c559;border:none;border-radius:6px;color:#fff;padding:16px 32px;text-align:center;text-decoration:none;text-transform:uppercase;font-size:16px;margin-top:16px;margin-bottom:16px;cursor:pointer;width:200px}.button:active,.button:focus{outline:0;border:none;-moz-outline-style:none}.button:disabled{cursor:not-allowed;background-color:#e7e7e7}.button-hoverable span{cursor:pointer;display:inline-block;position:relative;transition:.5s}.button-hoverable span:after{content:"\00bb";position:absolute;opacity:0;top:0;right:-20px;transition:.5s}.button-hoverable:hover span{padding-right:25px}.button-hoverable:hover span:after{opacity:1;right:0}.zoomImage{cursor:pointer;display:block;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;width:50%}#lb-back{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;max-width:100%;height:100vh;background:rgba(0,0,0,.5);z-index:999;visibility:hidden;opacity:0}#lb-back.show{visibility:visible;opacity:1}#lb-img,main article h3{text-align:center}#myImg{border-radius:5px;cursor:pointer;transition:.3s}#myImg:hover{opacity:.7}.modal{display:none;position:fixed;z-index:1;padding-top:100px;left:0;top:0;width:100%;height:100%;overflow:auto;background-color:#000;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.9)}#caption,.modal-content{margin:auto;display:block;width:80%;max-width:700px}#caption{text-align:center;color:#ccc;padding:10px 0;height:150px}#caption,.modal-content{animation-name:zoom;animation-duration:.6s}@keyframes zoom{0%{transform:scale(0)}to{transform:scale(1)}}.close{position:absolute;top:15px;right:35px;color:#f1f1f1;font-size:40px;font-weight:700;transition:.3s}.close:focus,.close:hover{color:#bbb;text-decoration:none;cursor:pointer}@media only screen and (max-width:700px){.modal-content{width:100%}}
